outputs.output_descr:
1. Implementation of strengthened support policies and regulatory frameworks and institutional capacity for adoption of sustainable practices production, conversion and use of biomass resources in Bhutan
2.Implementation of BET applications due to improved confidence in their feasibility, performance, environmental and economic benefits through demonstration projects, market mechanisms and increased private sector participation
3.  Improved knowledge, awareness and capacities of policy makers, financiers, suppliers and end-users on benefits and market opportunities for modern biomass energy technologies

project_descr: Adequate policies on renewable energy in place, strong institutional linkages established, and knowledge, awareness and capacities of stakeholders improved
